name: Captiv8
tagline: Help brands to create, engage & amplify.
description:
At Captiv8 we are passionate about realising what is possible when ideas, creativity and technology combine across broadcast and digital media.
We are a group of experienced, strategic and creative thinkers. Our team consists of creative and digital specialists, directors, designers, editors, producers and developers. We are encouraged to express our ideas and expertise at all levels and this is reflected in our independent and creative thinking.
